column4: would anyone happen to know if there is a port of Gedit for windows? i happen to be stuck on windows ATM[actually i will be for a while :(] and wish for somehting similar to gedit in size[gedit loads considerably faster than otehr text editing apps ive used], and would also like something with syntax highlighting and a simple interface
as ai general rule ive learned to google such things first. i had no luck so i came here for suggestions on programs
